update

protected void update(Permission permission,
                      java.util.Collection<? extends Entity> permissionCollection)
Updates the operations collection adding or removing the permission according to the permissionCollection

Parameters:
permission - the permission to be added/removed
permissionCollection - it it's empty the permission will be removed if not it will be added

updateOperations

protected abstract void updateOperations()
Updates the dto before saving permissions. Basically, check each collection to set the specific permission.
